formatted_data: N60, an AI-focused consultancy led by Generative AI strategist Matthew Robinson, provides practical courses and strategies to help businesses implement AI technologies. From topics like sales and customer engagement to finance and accounting, N60's service offerings are vast and comprehensive. Their online courses guide learners through the use of AI tools to revolutionize business operations. Some courses cover areas such as sales team optimization, utilizing AI in education, exploring AI technologies for HR, and performance improvement in finance. Other courses touch on AI's potential in marketing, regulation and legal compliance, supply chain and operations, creative design, and customer support. A monthly subscription gives access to over 100 hours of tutorials. The N60 site also provides a blog with posts discussing AI in different business sectors.
